Browse the source code of netbsd/external/ibm-public/postfix/dist/src/milter/milter.h

1/* $NetBSD: milter.h,v 1.2 2017/02/14 01:16:45 christos Exp $ */
2
3#ifndef _MILTER_H_INCLUDED_
4#define _MILTER_H_INCLUDED_
5
6/*++
7/* NAME
8/* milter 3h
9/* SUMMARY
10/* smtp server
11/* SYNOPSIS
12/* Postfix MTA-side Milter implementation
13/* DESCRIPTION
14/* .nf
15
16 /*
17 * Utility library.
18 */
19#include <vstring.h>
20#include <vstream.h>
21#include <argv.h>
22
23 /*
24 * Global library.
25 */
26#include <attr.h>
27
28 /*
29 * Each Milter handle is an element of a null-terminated linked list. The
30 * functions are virtual so that we can support multiple MTA-side Milter
31 * implementations. The Sendmail 8 and Sendmail X Milter-side APIs are too
32 * different to implement the MTA side as a single hybrid.
33 */
34typedef struct MILTER {
35 char *name; /* full name including transport */
36 int flags; /* see below */
37 struct MILTER *next; /* linkage */
38 struct MILTERS *parent; /* parent information */
39 struct MILTER_MACROS *macros; /* private macros */
40 const char *(*conn_event) (struct MILTER *, const char *, const char *, const char *, unsigned, ARGV *);
41 const char *(*helo_event) (struct MILTER *, const char *, int, ARGV *);
42 const char *(*mail_event) (struct MILTER *, const char **, ARGV *);
43 const char *(*rcpt_event) (struct MILTER *, const char **, ARGV *);
44 const char *(*data_event) (struct MILTER *, ARGV *);
45 const char *(*message) (struct MILTER *, VSTREAM *, off_t, ARGV *, ARGV *, ARGV *);
46 const char *(*unknown_event) (struct MILTER *, const char *, ARGV *);
47 const char *(*other_event) (struct MILTER *);
48 void (*abort) (struct MILTER *);
49 void (*disc_event) (struct MILTER *);
50 int (*active) (struct MILTER *);
51 int (*send) (struct MILTER *, VSTREAM *);
52 void (*free) (struct MILTER *);
53} MILTER;
54
55#define MILTER_FLAG_NONE (0)
56#define MILTER_FLAG_WANT_RCPT_REJ (1<<0) /* see S8_RCPT_MAILER_ERROR */
57
58extern MILTER *milter8_create(const char *, int, int, int, const char *, const char *, struct MILTERS *);
59extern MILTER *milter8_receive(VSTREAM *, struct MILTERS *);
60
61 /*
62 * As of Sendmail 8.14 each milter can override the default macro list. If a
63 * Milter has its own macro list, a null member means use the global
64 * definition.
65 */
66typedef struct MILTER_MACROS {
67 char *conn_macros; /* macros for connect event */
68 char *helo_macros; /* macros for HELO/EHLO command */
69 char *mail_macros; /* macros for MAIL FROM command */
70 char *rcpt_macros; /* macros for RCPT TO command */
71 char *data_macros; /* macros for DATA command */
72 char *eoh_macros; /* macros for end-of-headers */
73 char *eod_macros; /* macros for END-OF-DATA command */
74 char *unk_macros; /* macros for unknown command */
75} MILTER_MACROS;
76
77extern MILTER_MACROS *milter_macros_create(const char *, const char *,
78 const char *, const char *,
79 const char *, const char *,
80 const char *, const char *);
81extern MILTER_MACROS *milter_macros_alloc(int);
82extern void milter_macros_free(MILTER_MACROS *);
83extern int milter_macros_print(ATTR_PRINT_MASTER_FN, VSTREAM *, int, void *);
84extern int milter_macros_scan(ATTR_SCAN_MASTER_FN, VSTREAM *, int, void *);
85
86#define MILTER_MACROS_ALLOC_ZERO 1 /* null pointer */
87#define MILTER_MACROS_ALLOC_EMPTY 2 /* mystrdup(""); */
88
89 /*
90 * Helper to parse list of name=value default macro settings.
91 */
92extern struct HTABLE *milter_macro_defaults_create(const char *);
93
94 /*
95 * A bunch of Milters.
96 */
97typedef const char *(*MILTER_MAC_LOOKUP_FN) (const char *, void *);
98typedef const char *(*MILTER_ADD_HEADER_FN) (void *, const char *, const char *, const char *);
99typedef const char *(*MILTER_EDIT_HEADER_FN) (void *, ssize_t, const char *, const char *, const char *);
100typedef const char *(*MILTER_DEL_HEADER_FN) (void *, ssize_t, const char *);
101typedef const char *(*MILTER_EDIT_FROM_FN) (void *, const char *, const char *);
102typedef const char *(*MILTER_EDIT_RCPT_FN) (void *, const char *);
103typedef const char *(*MILTER_EDIT_RCPT_PAR_FN) (void *, const char *, const char *);
104typedef const char *(*MILTER_EDIT_BODY_FN) (void *, int, VSTRING *);
105
106typedef struct MILTERS {
107 MILTER *milter_list; /* linked list of Milters */
108 MILTER_MAC_LOOKUP_FN mac_lookup;
109 void *mac_context; /* macro lookup context */
110 struct MILTER_MACROS *macros;
111 struct HTABLE *macro_defaults;
112 void *chg_context; /* context for queue file changes */
113 MILTER_ADD_HEADER_FN add_header;
114 MILTER_EDIT_HEADER_FN upd_header;
115 MILTER_DEL_HEADER_FN del_header;
116 MILTER_EDIT_HEADER_FN ins_header;
117 MILTER_EDIT_FROM_FN chg_from;
118 MILTER_EDIT_RCPT_FN add_rcpt;
119 MILTER_EDIT_RCPT_PAR_FN add_rcpt_par;
120 MILTER_EDIT_RCPT_FN del_rcpt;
121 MILTER_EDIT_BODY_FN repl_body;
122} MILTERS;
123
124#define milter_create(milter_names, conn_timeout, cmd_timeout, msg_timeout, \
125 protocol, def_action, conn_macros, helo_macros, \
126 mail_macros, rcpt_macros, data_macros, eoh_macros, \
127 eod_macros, unk_macros, macro_deflts) \
128 milter_new(milter_names, conn_timeout, cmd_timeout, msg_timeout, \
129 protocol, def_action, milter_macros_create(conn_macros, \
130 helo_macros, mail_macros, rcpt_macros, data_macros, \
131 eoh_macros, eod_macros, unk_macros), \
132 milter_macro_defaults_create(macro_deflts))
133
134extern MILTERS *milter_new(const char *, int, int, int, const char *,
135 const char *, MILTER_MACROS *,
136 struct HTABLE *);
137extern void milter_macro_callback(MILTERS *, MILTER_MAC_LOOKUP_FN, void *);
138extern void milter_edit_callback(MILTERS *milters, MILTER_ADD_HEADER_FN,
139 MILTER_EDIT_HEADER_FN, MILTER_EDIT_HEADER_FN,
140 MILTER_DEL_HEADER_FN, MILTER_EDIT_FROM_FN,
141 MILTER_EDIT_RCPT_FN, MILTER_EDIT_RCPT_PAR_FN,
142 MILTER_EDIT_RCPT_FN, MILTER_EDIT_BODY_FN,
143 void *);
144extern const char *milter_conn_event(MILTERS *, const char *, const char *, const char *, unsigned);
145extern const char *milter_helo_event(MILTERS *, const char *, int);
146extern const char *milter_mail_event(MILTERS *, const char **);
147extern const char *milter_rcpt_event(MILTERS *, int, const char **);
148extern const char *milter_data_event(MILTERS *);
149extern const char *milter_message(MILTERS *, VSTREAM *, off_t, ARGV *);
150extern const char *milter_unknown_event(MILTERS *, const char *);
151extern const char *milter_other_event(MILTERS *);
152extern void milter_abort(MILTERS *);
153extern void milter_disc_event(MILTERS *);
154extern int milter_dummy(MILTERS *, VSTREAM *);
155extern int milter_send(MILTERS *, VSTREAM *);
156extern MILTERS *milter_receive(VSTREAM *, int);
157extern void milter_free(MILTERS *);
158
159 /*
160 * Milter body edit commands.
161 */
162#define MILTER_BODY_START 1 /* start message body */
163#define MILTER_BODY_LINE 2 /* message body line */
164#define MILTER_BODY_END 3 /* end message body */
165
166 /*
167 * Sendmail 8 macro names. We support forms with and without the {}.
168 */
169#define S8_MAC__ "{_}" /* sender resolve */
170#define S8_MAC_J "{j}" /* myhostname */
171#define S8_MAC_V "{v}" /* mail_name + mail_version */
172
173#define S8_MAC_DAEMON_NAME "{daemon_name}"
174#define S8_MAC_IF_NAME "{if_name}"
175#define S8_MAC_IF_ADDR "{if_addr}"
176
177#define S8_MAC_CLIENT_ADDR "{client_addr}"
178#define S8_MAC_CLIENT_CONN "{client_connections}"
179#define S8_MAC_CLIENT_NAME "{client_name}"
180#define S8_MAC_CLIENT_PORT "{client_port}"
181#define S8_MAC_CLIENT_PTR "{client_ptr}"
182#define S8_MAC_CLIENT_RES "{client_resolve}"
183
184#define S8_MAC_TLS_VERSION "{tls_version}"
185#define S8_MAC_CIPHER "{cipher}"
186#define S8_MAC_CIPHER_BITS "{cipher_bits}"
187#define S8_MAC_CERT_SUBJECT "{cert_subject}"
188#define S8_MAC_CERT_ISSUER "{cert_issuer}"
189
190#define S8_MAC_I "{i}" /* queue ID */
191#define S8_MAC_AUTH_TYPE "{auth_type}" /* SASL method */
192#define S8_MAC_AUTH_AUTHEN "{auth_authen}" /* SASL username */
193#define S8_MAC_AUTH_AUTHOR "{auth_author}" /* SASL sender */
194
195#define S8_MAC_MAIL_MAILER "{mail_mailer}" /* sender transport */
196#define S8_MAC_MAIL_HOST "{mail_host}" /* sender nexthop */
197#define S8_MAC_MAIL_ADDR "{mail_addr}" /* sender address */
198
199#define S8_MAC_RCPT_MAILER "{rcpt_mailer}" /* recip transport */
200#define S8_MAC_RCPT_HOST "{rcpt_host}" /* recip nexthop */
201#define S8_MAC_RCPT_ADDR "{rcpt_addr}" /* recip address */
202
203#define S8_RCPT_MAILER_ERROR "error" /* see MILTER_FLAG_WANT_RCPT_REJ */
204
